EmailTemplate.name: 17.CusNetOp.XLE.webXLE.N.G.N.8544.Email 6 - Guide
EmailTemplate.subject: Reuse existing Avaya equipment while building a new communications infrastructure.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Worried about your Avaya infrastructure? Replace your Legacy PBX with Nokia Rapport Avaya Equipment Integration Guide
Nokia can show you how to replace your existing PBXs with a cloud based solution within your current PBX maintenance budget, and get started right away on achieving your digital transformation goals.
Learn how you can reuse Avaya desk sets and other equipment but still replace your Avaya PBXs with a cloud-based enterprise communications solution, Nokia Rapport. Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Communications and Collaboration Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
